version_description: We keep on improving the game. Some discreet but useful changes are added
We improved game mechanics for better game experience.
We fixed errors and shortcomings

- Christmas and New Year event
- Decoration and ornaments for the raft
- Photo mode â€” save photos of your raft

Option to throw away Christmas ornaments and batteries
Tips in the quest menu
Fixed the bugs in the training causing the quest for visiting an island disappear
Added a travel marker on hovering over an island
Fix crashes, minor minor bug fixes

Great new water!
Completely redesigned craft;
New world map;
Free movement on the map;
Rafts of other survivors;
New islands;
New animals on the islands;

Crash fixes
Fixed crashes, balance edits, updated facebook sdk version.

Added a subscription to the game
Fixed bugs

Editing the balance of the game
Bugs fixed

1 - Added an ability to cut trees with an axe
2 - ability to mine ore with a pickaxe
3 - ability to catch fish with a fishing rod
4 - a whole new shop
5 - a function to buy resource packs
6 - new items
7 - improved game balance

Editing the balance of the game
Bugs fixed

1 - Ability to build multiple chests (and other stations).
2 - Fixed bug with accelerated consumption of food and water.
3 - Increased the amount of water that the bottles give. Canned food now also quenches thirst.
4 - Optimized performance.

1 - fixed display of Chinese language
2 - fixed shark attack timer
3 - fixed bug with moving some stations

Added a subscription to the game
Fixed bugs

Fixed crashes, improved stability
Fixed the bug causing the shark to instantly destroy raft parts
Stations can now be built by tapping on a building area
